"T:Regiment of the Wicked 2019":
"An unusual concentration of power has
been observed in the Kuron area of
planet Harkotan. A huge moon is floating
in the sky, and reports suggest it is
driving nearby enemies into a frenzy.
All ARKS are being dispatched
immediately to investigate the situation
and suppress the frenzied enemies.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
"Transfer will begin shortly. Your objective is to suppress the enemies and investigate the source of the power driving them into a frenzy."
"The large red moon in the sky seems to be the cause, but it appears to have been formed from a concentration of unknown power."
"We expect that you will face many dangerous battles. Please be careful, everyone!"
